text:
At #WTFisCloudNative, @holly_cummins put the spot on the difference between #decoupled and #distributed! 
Don't be fooled by the shiny lights if all your services are having the same version! https://t.co/LSAQmeKPQz

author.name: Philippe Ensarguet
author.description: Senior tech exec | 2021 Awarded CTO | CTO at @orangebusiness | Board advisor @weaveworks @cycloid_io | Speaker | @TechRocksFr curator | Bike addict
